title: Scientists Say Strange Signals Are ‘Probably’ Coming from Extraterrestrial Intelligence?
subtitle: Astronomers analyzed a database of spectra from 2.5 million stars and were unable to explain the nature of 234 of them, but while the authors of the study did indeed propose extraterrestrials as an explanation, their certainty has been exaggerated in the media and tempered by other scientists.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Two scientists who analyzed 2.5 million stars have concluded that the signals coming from a small fraction of them are “probably” caused by aliens.
